```text
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate mine at position(-21.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill at position (-21.0, -50.0)
- Transport belt at position (-20.5, -48.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-19.5, -49.5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Burner inserter at position (-13.5, -49.5) that puts into wooden chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)

### Belt system
Consists of following entities
- Burner inserter at position (-18.5, -48.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-17.5, -46.5)

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting items from entities
- Ensure the target entity contains the item you are trying to extract.

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure you are using the correct crafting method for the item. Some items require a crafting machine or furnace.

### Errors when placing entities due to distance
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place the entity. The maximum placement distance is 10.

# NAMESPACE

### Variables
- No new variables to report
```
